title: Business & Finance
text:
Twitter users said Musk should sell 10% of his Tesla stock, valued at about $21 billion, after the CEO polled them and pledged to abide by the outcome of the vote.

---

BHP said it would sell its controlling interest in two metallurgical coal mines to Stanmore for up to $1.35 billion.

---

Blackstone is investing up to $250 million in U.K. biotech company Autolus to fund the final stages of development of a new drug to treat a serious form of leukemia.

---

FiscalNote, a provider of services used to track government policy, is in talks to go public through a merger with a blank-check company at a valuation of $1.3 billion.

---

Disney's Marvel film "The Eternals" opened to a healthy $71 million at the box office in the U.S. and Canada.

---

Berkshire said net earnings fell after paper gains from its stock investments declined from a year earlier.
